result.eng: They are becoming more numerous from year to year.
result.ga: Tá siad ag dul i líonmhaire ó bhliain go bliain

result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag dul i líonṁaire ó ḃliain go bliainThey are becoming more numerous from year to year.
